rows.label: bf11600100_0010
rows.name: What an incredible place...

rows.label: bf11600100_0020
rows.name: It's the matrix of our Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf11600100_0030
rows.name: What does...?

rows.label: bf11600100_0040
rows.name:
When the time comes,
this is where Blades come to be reborn as Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf11600100_0050
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?!

rows.label: bf11600100_0060
rows.name: You mean we'll all become Divine Beasts some day?

rows.label: bf11600100_0070
rows.name: It's nice to be here again.

rows.label: bf11600100_0075
rows.name: After 800 years...

rows.label: bf11600100_0080
rows.name: Were you born here too, Seiryu?

rows.label: bf11600100_0090
rows.name:
Mhm! After all I was a Blade born
from the Iiran Divine Beast.

rows.label: bf11600100_0100
rows.name: Of course, I don't have any memories of that time...

rows.label: bf11600100_0110
rows.name:
Once a Blade becomes a Divine Beast, they can
live without being bound to the Driver who awoke them.

rows.label: bf11600100_0120
rows.name:
One day, they may come to watch over their children,
as the very ground beneath their feet.

rows.label: bf11600100_0130
rows.name: And the fleeting bonds become eternal.

rows.label: bf11600100_0140
rows.name: It's the basis of the Iran creed.

rows.label: bf11600100_0150
rows.name: Eternal bonds...

rows.label: bf11600100_0160
rows.name: So... What now?

rows.label: bf11600100_0170
rows.name: Metsu said he was going to wait...

rows.label: bf11600100_0180
rows.name: But can we really believe him?

rows.label: bf11600100_0190
rows.name: I don't think he lied.

rows.label: bf11600100_0200
rows.name: Why so?

rows.label: bf11600100_0210
rows.name: He was enjoying himself. That's why.

rows.label: bf11600100_0220
rows.name: I'd say, he's having way too much fun to stop right now.

rows.label: bf11600100_0230
rows.name: He said that humans long for death.

rows.label: bf11600100_0240
rows.name: ...And that he was happy to oblige.

rows.label: bf11600100_0250
rows.name: Benevolent servant...*scoff*.

rows.label: bf11600100_0260
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...
